title: Should He End His Toxic Marriage To Pursue His Coworker?
description:
His marriage hasn’t been the best for a long time. And recently, he met someone at work that brings joy to his day. He’s considering pursuing her but isn't sure if it's a good idea or not. Should he get a divorce or try to work on his marriage?
